line: He looks like a slopper to me.
I could use some help in the kitchen.
Oh! Hey, we got a runner!
You're not gonna run again. Okay?
Can you tell me anything about yourself? Who you are?
Where you came from? Anything at all.
Can you tell me your name?
I, uh, I can't remember anything.
You'll get your name back in a day or two.
It's the one thing they let us keep.
We eat here. We sleep here. We grow our own food. We build our own shelter.
translation: 우린 여기서 먹고 여기서 자고 먹을거리 재배하고 집도 직접 지어

line: Whatever we need, the Box provides. The rest is up to us.
translation: 필요한건 '박스'를 통해 오고 나머진 우리가 알아서 해

line: Yeah. It's sent up once a month with fresh supplies and a new Greenie.
translation: 그래, 매달 한번 필수품과 신참을 올려보내

line: Sent up? By who, though? Who put us here?
Hey, are you all right, Alby?
Green Bean, meet Newt. When I'm not around, he's in charge.
translation: 신참, 이쪽은 뉴트. 내가 없으면 얘가 대장이야

line: Well, it's a good thing you're always around then.
That was some dash you made earlier.
For a second, I thought you had the chops to be a runner...till you face-planted.
translation: 근데 러너 감이라고 생각하는 순간... 땅에 얼굴 처박더라

line: Newt, do me a favor. Go find Chuck.
Look, I'm sorry to rush this. You came up a little late, and there's a lot to do.
translation: 서둘러서 미안한데 네가 좀 늦게 와서 말야 할 게 많아

line: We got something special planned tonight.
I hope you're not afraid of heights.
If you respect this place...you and I will get along just fine.
translation: 적응 잘하면 나랑 부딪힐 일 없어
둘째, 다른 친구들을 해치지 말 것

line: None of this works unless we have trust.
Most importantly...never go beyond those walls.
translation: 무엇보다 중요한 건...절대 저 벽을 넘어가지 마

line: Hey, Chuck. Where you been, man?
It's basically the same story for all of us.
We wake up in the Box, Alby gives us the tour...
You're already doing better than I did.
I clunked my pants three times before they got me out of the pit.
translation: 박스 안에서 세번이나 바지에 똥을 쌌거든

line: You can look around all you want but you better not go out there.
I don't know. I just know what I'm told.
And we're not supposed to leave.
How does it feel to be promoted?
I thought no one was allowed to leave.
I said we're not allowed to leave.
They're different, they're runners. They know more about the maze than anyone.
Where are you going? What are you doing?
I'm just gonna take a look.
I told you, you can't. No one leaves, especially not now.
translation: 우린 들어가면 안 된다니까 특히 지금은...

line: Okay, all right, I'm not gonna go.
We gotta stop meeting like this, Greenie.
What the hell is wrong with you guys?
Why won't you tell me what's out there?
We're just trying to protect you. It's for your own good.
translation: 널 지켜주려는 거야. 네 안전을 위해서

line: You guys can't just keep me here.
Next time, I'm gonna let you leave.
Hell of a first day, Greenie.
Put some hair on your chest.
Oh, my God! What is that?
Yeah, well, he's still an asshole.
Trust me. The maze is a dangerous place.
That guy in the middle there, that's Minho.
He's the Keeper of the Runners.
Every morning, when those doors open, they run the maze...mapping it, memorizing it, trying to find a way out.
translation: 아침마다 문이 열리면 쟤들이 미로 안을 뛰면서 구조를 외우고 지도를 만들며 나갈 길을 찾아

line: How long have they been looking?
It's a lot easier said than done.
You can ask the people who put us in here, if you ever meet the bastards.
translation: 우릴 여기 보낸 놈들한테 물어봐 만나게 된다면!

line: Listen, the truth is...the runners are the only ones who really know what's out there.
translation: 솔직히 말해서 밖에 뭐가 있는지 아는 건 러너들뿐이야

line: They are the strongest and the fastest of us all. And it's a good thing, too... because if they don't make it back before those doors close...then they are stuck out there for the night.
translation: 우리들 중에 가장 강하고 빠른데 다행인 거지. 왜냐면 문이 닫히기 전에 못 돌아오면 미로에서 밤을 보내야 하는데

line: And no one has ever survived a night in the maze.
translation: 밤중에 미로 안에서 살아남은 사람 없어

line: Of course, no one's ever seen one and lived to tell about it.
translation: 물론 놈들을 만났다가 살아돌아온 애는 없지

line: Right, that's enough questions for one night.
Come on. You're supposed to be the guest of honor.
And there we got the builders.
They're very good with their hands but not a lot going on upstairs.
And then we got Winston he's the Keeper of the Slicers.
And we got two med-jacks, Clint and Jeff.
They spend most of their time bandaging up the slicers.
What if I want to be a runner?
Have you listened to a word I've just said? No one wants to be a runner.
translation: 내 말 안듣고 뭐했어? 러너가 되고 싶어하는 사람은 없어

line: And, besides, you gotta get chosen.
Wanna see what you're made of?
I try to push you out of the circle...
you try to last more than five seconds.
Take it easy on the Greenie.
Come on, Greenie. We're not done yet.
translation: 일어나, 신참 아직 끝난 게 아냐

line: Stop calling you that? What do you wanna be called? Shank?
translation: 왜, 싫어? 그럼 뭐라고 불러줄까? 초짜?

line: What do you think, boys? Does he look like a Shank?
You know what? I think I've settled on Shank.
Not bad for a Greenie, huh?
I remember my name. I'm Thomas!
That, my friend, was a Griever.
Don't worry, you're safe here with us.
Let's tuck it in for the night. Come on.
I know it's hard to believe, but it wasn't always this way. We had dark days.
translation: 믿기 힘들겠지만 항상 이렇진 않았어. 힘든 시기가 있었지

line: We lost a lot of boys to fear. To panic.
translation: 많은 친구들이 공포와 두려움 속에 죽어갔고...

line: Yeah. Why are you telling me this?
translation: 왜 나한테 그런 얘길 하는 거야?

line: Because you're not like the others.
But you're one of us now.
You need to know what that means.
Has anyone tried climbing to the top?
Tried it. The ivy doesn't go all the way to the top.
translation: 시도는 해봤지 담쟁이덩굴이 거기까지 안 자라

line: And besides, where are you gonna go from there?
And what about the Box? You know, next time it comes up...
The Box won't go back down with someone in it.
No, we tried it, all right? Twice.
All right? Trust me. Anything you think of, we've already tried.
translation: 네가 생각해낼 수 있는 것들, 다 해봤어

line: The only way out of here is through the maze.
Now, look, you wanna be helpful?
Here. Go dig us up some more fertilizer.
"Are you sure, guys? I can't help in any other way?"
"You know where it is. It's just out in the middle of the woods."
I don't know if we ever...
In the middle of the day?
Everybody, help. Take him to the pit.
Please stop! No! No, please! Help me!
It's what happens when someone gets stung.
We haven't been able to get a clear word out of Ben since it happened. He's not making any sense. And it's only gonna get worse.
translation: 벤이 찔린 후로 이상해졌어. 이해할 수 없는 헛소리만 해대고 점점 더 심해지겠지

line: The infection is spreading. He's dangerous.
translation: 감염이 퍼질 텐데 그냥 두면 위험해

line: What did he say to you?
and that this was all my fault.
How could this be my fault?
Just listen to me. Just, please, listen to me!
translation: 좀 들어봐 제발 내 말을 들어보라구

line: I can get better! Please, just listen to me!
translation: 금방 나을 거야 제발 내 말을 들어봐

line: He belongs to the maze now.
Do you think he might make it?
No one survives a night in the maze.
We just gotta forget about him.
Don't make it easy on them.
This is gonna hurt a little.
But why would Alby go into the maze?
I mean, he's not a runner.
Alby went to retrace Ben's footsteps before sundown.
translation: 벤이 갔던 곳을 확인하러 들어간 거야

line: So he's gonna go back to where Ben was just stung...
Alby knows what he's doing all right?
He knows better than any of us.
Well, it's like you have heard, yeah? Every month, the Box sends up a new arrival.
translation: 너도 들었겠지만 매달 신참이 박스에 담겨서 와.

line: But someone had to be first, right? Someone had to have spent a whole month in the Glade, alone.
translation: 하지만 맨 처음에 온 사람은 글레이드에서 한달을 혼자 지내야 했지

line: I mean, it can't have been easy.
But when those other boys started coming up, one after the other... he saw the truth.
translation: 이후로 다른 애들이 줄줄이 왔고 알비는 진실을 봤어

line: And he learned that the most important thing...is that we all have each other.
translation: 가장 중요한 게 뭔지를 깨달은 거지. 힘을 합쳐야 살아남는다는 거...

line: Because we're all in this together.
They should be back by now.
What happens if they don't make it?
Come on, guys, can't we send someone after them?
Either they make it back or they don't.
We can't risk losing anyone else.
Come on, Minho, you can do it!
Come on, you can make it!
I did what I had to do.
Okay. Okay, help me get him up.
We gotta go. The maze is already changing.
translation: 가야 돼 미로가 벌써 바뀌고 있어

line: We can't just leave him here.
Just sit him down. Sit him down.
This isn't going to work. We gotta go.
Wait, what are you talking about? We gotta hide him.
Are you telling me there's not a single place we could take him?
Listen to me, shuck-face, all right.
Take a look around. There's nowhere to go!
translation: 주위를 봐 숨길 곳 따윈 없다구

line: What are you doing? What are you doing?
We gotta go. We gotta go now!
No, no, just a little more and we'll tie it off.
translation: 안돼, 조금 더 올려서 묶어야 돼

line: Just a little more, we're almost there.
You're a crazy son of a bitch.
Come on, follow me. Come on!
Okay, it's changing. Come on, come on!
This section is closing. Come on.
We can lose it down here!
What are you waiting for? Get out of there!
Come on, Thomas! Don't look back!
Move your ass! Let's go! Come on!
I got him, I got him, I got him.
How did you guys make it out?
He didn't just see it. He killed it.
translation: 보기만 한 게 아냐. 토마스가 놈을 죽였어.

line: First, Ben gets stung in broad daylight.
And now our Greenie, here, has taken it upon himself...to go into the maze.
translation: 그리고 여기 이 신참은 자기 멋대로 미로에 들어갔어

line: Which is a clear violation of our rules here.
Yeah... but he saved Alby's life.
For 3 years, we have coexisted with these things.
And now, you've killed one of them.
Who knows what that could mean for us.
What do you suggest we do?
You were there with him. What do you think?
in all the time we've been here...no one has ever killed a Griever before.
translation: 지금까지 우리들 중에 그리버를 죽인 사람은 없었어

line: When I turned tail and ran...
this dumb shank stayed behind to help Alby.
translation: 저 초짜는 알비 구하겠다고 뒤에 남았지

line: Look, I don't know if he's brave or stupid.
But whatever it is, we need more of it.
I say we make him a runner.
Minho, let's not jump the gun, here.
If you want to throw the newbie a parade, that's fine.
But if there is one thing I know about the maze... it is that you do not...
translation: 하지만 미로에 대해선 내가 잘 아는데 절대로...

line: Okay, wait. I know that sound.
The Box. It's coming back up.
What the hell does that mean?
Do you still think I'm overreacting?
What's the matter with her? Why won't she wake up?
translation: 문제가 뭐지? 왜 깨어나질 않는 거야?

line: Hey man, I got my job the same way you did.
translation: 나도 너희들 처럼 이 일을 하게 된거라고!

line: Really? Because she seemed to recognize you.
translation: 이 여자는 널 아는 것 같던걸

line: We'll worry about the note later.
I think you should worry about it now.
We've got enough to deal with at the moment.
translation: 지금 그거 신경 쓸 겨를 없어

line: If the Box isn't coming back up, how long do you think we can last?
translation: 박스가 안 올라오면 우리가 얼마나 버티겠어?

line: Let's not jump to any conclusions.
We'll just wait until she wakes up and see what she knows.
translation: 이 여자가 깨어나면 뭘 아는지 알아내자

line: Somebody has gotta have some answers around here.
What is this with you, huh? A death wish?
You just got out and now you want back in?
Newt said that no one has ever seen a Griever and lived to tell about it, right?
translation: 뉴트는 그리버 만나서 살아남은 사람 없댔지?

line: You're telling me you're not even a little bit curious?
You're gonna go out and dissect that thing all by yourself?
I will if I have to.
Have the other runners left yet?
The other runners quit this morning.
After Alby got stung, they're not in any hurry to get back out there.
translation: 알비가 찔린 후로 미로에 들어가길 주저해

line: I think it's time we find out what we're really up against.
But you're not going back out there alone.
Meet me in the woods in half-an-hour.
You mean, besides a Griever pancake?
translation: 그리버 팬케이크 말고 뭐가 더 있다고?

line: I thought you said it was dead.
Okay, come on. Let's try and pull it out.
Everyone get a hand on it. Come on.
can we take this up back at the Glade?
Because I don't want to meet this guy's friends.
These are the same letters we get in our supplies.
Yeah. Whoever put us here obviously made the Grievers.
translation: 그래. 우릴 여기 보낸 자들이 그리버를 만든 거야.

line: This is the first real clue, the first anything, you've found in over 3 years. Right, Minho?
translation: 이게 3년 만에 처음 찾아낸 진짜 단서지.  안 그래, 민호?

line: Newt, we gotta go back out there. Who knows where this might lead us.
translation: 뉴트, 다시 미로로 들어가야 돼. 이걸 이용하면 출구를 찾을지도 몰라

line: You see what he's trying to do, right?
First he breaks our rules...and then he tries to convince us to abandon them totally.
translation: 처음엔 룰을 깨뜨리더니 이젠 싸그리 무시하라고 꼬드기고 있잖아

line: The rules are the only thing that have ever held us together.
translation: 지금껏 룰이 있어서 여기가 잘 굴러갔어

line: Why now are we questioning that?
If Alby was here, you know he'd agree with me.
This shank needs to be punished.
translation: 이 초짜 자식은 벌을 받아야 돼

line: One night in the pit, and no food.
Come on, Newt! One night in the pit?
Do you think that's gonna stop him from going into the maze?
translation: 그걸로 미로에 가는 걸 막을 수 있을 것 같아?

line: And we can't just have non-runners running into the maze whenever they feel like it.
translation: 러너가 아닌데 미로에 들여보낼 순 없지

line: So let's just make this official.
Starting from tomorrow, you're a runner.
What do you mean "all of it"? I thought you were still mapping it.
translation: 무슨 소리야? 아직 다 파악 못했다면서

line: I've run every inch of it myself.
If there was a way out, we would have found it by now.
Why haven't you told anyone this?
People needed to believe we had a chance of getting out.
translation: 여길 나갈 수 있다는 꿈을 갖게 해주자고...

line: But maybe now...we have a real chance.
translation: 근데 어쩌면 더 이상은 꿈이 아닐 거야

line: About a year ago, we started exploring these outer sections.
We found these numbers printed on the walls.
See, the way it works, is every night, when the maze changes...it opens up a new section.
translation: 방식은 이래 매일밤 미로가 바뀔 때 새로운 구역이 열리는데

line: Tomorrow, it will be 4, then 8, then 3.
The pattern always stays the same.
But last night, when you killed that Griever... Section 7 was open.
translation: 어젯밤에 네가 그리버를 죽였을 때 7구역이 열렸어

line: I think it must be where it comes from.
Tomorrow, you and I are gonna take a closer look.
Hey! What are you guys doing? You're not allowed in here.
Sorry, it's just the, uh...It's the girl.
Hey, throw one more of those things... Ow!
I don't think she likes us very much.
What do You want from me?
This is all normal. Okay? We've all been through this.
Your name will come back to you in a couple of days.
But you already knew that, though, I guess, huh?
They said I kept saying your name in my sleep.
translation: 내가 잠결에 계속 네 이름을 불렀대

line: None of us here can remember anything.
We all woke up here just like you did.
Hey, listen, you guys just give us a second, okay?
Is this what all girls are like?
"She's the last one." What does that mean?
Ever since you came up, that Box hasn't gone back down.
translation: 네가 온 후로 박스가 내려가질 않아

line: I just think it's got everyone a little worried.
Are you sure you don't remember anything else?
These faces staring at me. And this woman's voice saying the same thing over and over. "Wicked is good."
translation: 날 쳐다보는 얼굴들, 같은 말을 계속 되풀이하는 어떤 여자의 목소리. '위키드는 좋은 일을 하는거야'

line: Ever since I've been here, I've had these dreams. Well, I thought they were dreams. You... You were there.
translation: 여기 온 후로 계속 같은 꿈을 꿨어. 지금까진 꿈인 줄 알았지. 네가... 그 꿈에 나왔어

line: and you told me that everything was gonna change.
I don't know. I just always get pieces.
And the others don't remember anything?
These were in my pocket when I came up.
What if we were sent here for a reason?
translation: 우릴 여기 보낸 이유가 있지 않을까?

line: We don't even know what this stuff is.
We don't know who sent it.
Or why it came up here with you.
For all we know, this thing could kill him.
How could this possibly make it any worse?
Come on, it's worth a try.
You shouldn't be here! You shouldn't be here!
Okay, from now on... someone stays here and watches him around the clock.
Hey, what is your problem with me?
Everything started going wrong the minute you showed up. First Ben, then Alby... and now the girl.
translation: 네가 나타난 순간부터 모든 게 틀어졌어. 처음엔 벤, 그리고 알비, 이제 여자애까지

line: And I'm betting you know who she is.
you know we can't stay here forever, right?
translation: 너도 알잖아? 영원히 여기 있을 순 없어

line: You'll run better on a full stomach.
Hey, what do you got there?
Wow, that came out pretty damn good.
I mean, I know I must have them.
And wherever they are, I'm sure they miss me... but I can't miss them because I don't remember them.
translation: 부모님은 날 그리워하겠지만 난 기억이 안나서 그리워하지도 못해

line: What do you think you're gonna find out there tomorrow?
translation: 내일 미로에 들어가면 뭐가 있을 것 같아?

line: But if there's a way out, Chuck, me and Minho are gonna find it.
translation: 하지만 출구가 있다면 민호와 내가 찾아낼 거야

line: Chuck, why would you give this to me?
But maybe if you find a way out, you can give it to them for me.
I'll let you get some sleep.
I want you to give that to them yourself.
We're gonna get out of here.
Big day, Greenie. Are you sure you don't wanna sit this one out?
translation: 중요한 날인데, 신참 혹시 빠질 생각없어?

line: Come on, man. Get me out of here.
This way. Not much further to the inner ring.
Seven is not supposed to be open for another week.
What the hell is this place?
A Griever must have pulled him down here.
I think it's showing us the way.
Minho, you ever see this place before?
We gotta get out of here.
Give me the key, give me the key!
Come on! Let's go, let's go!
Keep going! Keep going! Let's go!
What the hell's going on out there?
What the hell you done now, Thomas?
We found something, a new passage. We think it could be a way out.
We opened a door, something I'd never seen before.
I think it must be where the Grievers go during the day.
You're saying you found the Grievers' home?
And you want us to go in?
Their way in could be our way out, Chuck.
Yeah, or there could be a dozen Grievers on the other side.
The truth is, Thomas doesn't know what he has done, as usual.
translation: 토마스는 자기가 무슨 짓을 했는지 몰라

line: Yeah, at least I did something, Gally. I mean, what have you done? Aside from hide behind these walls all the time?
translation: 난 그거라도 했지, 갤리 넌 뭘 했어? 벽 뒤에 숨는 것 빼고 뭘 했냐구?

line: Let me tell you something, Greenie.
You've been here 3 days, all right? I've been here 3 years!
translation: 넌 여기 온지 사흘 됐지만 난 3년째야

line: Yeah, you've been here 3 years and you're still here, Gally! What does that tell you?
translation: 3년이나 있었는데 아직도 여기 있잖아, 갤리. 아직도 몰라?

line: Maybe you should start doing things a little differently.
Maybe you should be in charge, what about that?
Alby, we might have just found a way out of the maze.
translation: 미로에서 나가는 길을 찾은 것 같아

line: Do you hear me? We could be getting out of here.
You were always their favorite, Thomas.
It's the doors. They aren't closing.
Chuck, go to the Council Hall, and start barricading the doors.
translation: 척, 본부로 가서 물건들로 문을 막아

line: Get the others. Tell them to go to the forest. Go hide, now!
translation: 다른 애들한테 숲에 숨으라고 해 어서!

line: Minho, I want you to grab every weapon you can find.
I'll meet you at Council Hall.
Teresa, you and I are gonna go get Alby, all right? Come on.
Gally! Let me in, let me in!
Jeff, come on, go, go, go!
Over here! Let's go! Come on!
Chuck, get in! Go, go, go!
This is all you, Thomas! Look around!
translation: 다 네 탓이야 토마스! 주위를 봐!

line: Back off, Gally! It's not Thomas' fault!
He's one of them, and they sent him here to destroy everything, and now he has!
translation: 여길 파괴하라고 놈들이 보냈고 그렇게 됐다구

line: What are you talking about? Calm down.
Teresa... why are we doing this?
How could this be my fault?
I can't keep watching them die.
translation: 그들이 죽어가는 걸 더는 못 보겠어

line: What the hell were you thinking?
He said we had a choice. Either join him... or get banished at sundown with you.
translation: 우리더러 선택하래 자길 따르든지, 아님 너랑 미로에서 죽든지...

line: And the others agreed to that?
Gally has everyone convinced that you're the reason all this has happened.
translation: 너 때문에 우리가 이렇게 됐다는 갤리 말에 설득 당했어

line: Well, he's been right so far.
This place... it's not what we thought it was.
It's not a prison, it's a test.
It all started when we were kids.
They would give us these challenges.
Every month, one after the other, like clockwork.
They were sending them up into the maze.
Yeah, but not all of us.
The people who put you here, I worked with them.
translation: 너흴 여기 보낸 자들과 함께 일했었어

line: I watched you guys for years.
The entire time you have been here... I was on the other side of it.
translation: 너희들이 여기 있는 동안 난 반대쪽에 있었어

line: Teresa, we did this to them.
Why would they send us up if we were with them?
translation: 우리가 그들 일원이라면 왜 여기로 보낸거지?

line: Any of it. Because the people we were before the maze don't even exist anymore. These Creators took care of that.
translation: 이 모든 게... 미로에 오기 전의 우리는 이제 존재하지 않아. 예전 기억은 다 지워졌으니까.

line: But what does matter is who we are now, and what we do...right now.
translation: 지금 우리가 누구이고, 무엇을 하는가가 중요한거야.

line: You went into the maze and you found a way out.
translation: 넌 미로에 들어갔고 나갈 길을 찾아냈어

line: Yeah, but if I hadn't, Alby would still be alive.
translation: 내가 안 들어갔으면 알비가 안 죽었겠지

line: But I know that if he were here, he would be telling you the exact same thing.
translation: 하지만 살아있었다면 나와 똑같은 말을 했겠지

line: Pick your ass up and finish what you started.
translation: 어서 일어나서 네가 시작한 것을 끝내

line: Because if we do nothing... then that means Alby died for nothing, and I can't have that.
translation: 왜냐면 우리가 가만히 있으면 알비는 헛되이 죽은 거고 난 그럴 수 없어.

line: Okay, but we gotta get through Gally first.
Gally... It doesn't feel right, man.
translation: 갤리... 이건 옳지 않은 것 같아

line: Yeah, what if Thomas is right?
Maybe he can lead us home.
I don't wanna have to cross any more names off that wall.
translation: 저 벽에 딴애들 이름을 지우긴 싫다구

line: You really think banishing us is gonna solve anything?
translation: 우릴 추방한다고 다 해결될 것 같아?

line: You really think I'm gonna let Thomas back into the maze after what he has done?
translation: 토마스가 한 짓을 보고도 다시 미로로 보낼 줄 알았어?

line: And when the Grievers get what they came here for... everything goes back to the way it was.
translation: 그리버들이 원하는 걸 얻으면 모든 게 옛날로 돌아갈 거야.

line: Are you listening to this? Why are you all just standing there? He's crazy!
translation: 얘 말을 믿어? 왜 그렇게들 섰어? 얜 미쳤어!

line: If you stay here, the Grievers are going to come back. They're gonna come back, and they're gonna keep coming back until you're all dead!
translation: 여기 있으면 그리버들이 다시 와. 너희 모두가 죽을 때까지 계속 올 거라구

line: Do you hear me? I said tie him up!
You're full of surprises, aren't you?
You don't have to come with us, but we are leaving.
translation: 원한다면 남아도 좋지만 우린 갈 거야

line: Anyone else who wants to come, now is your last chance.
translation: 우리랑 가고 싶다면 이게 마지막 기회야

line: Don't listen to him, he's just trying to scare you.
No, I'm not trying to scare you. You're already scared.
translation: 그럴 필요가 없지 벌써 겁에 질렸으니까

line: But I'd rather risk my life out there than spending the rest of it in here.
translation: 여기서 평생을 사느니 차라리 미로에서 죽겠어

line: We were put here. We were trapped here.
At least, out there we have a choice. We can make it out of here.
translation: 미로에 들어가면 승산이 있어. 여길 벗어날 수 있어.

line: Keep it up, guys, we're almost there!
You take this, Chuck. Stay behind us.
translation: 받아, 척 넌 우리 뒤를 따라와

line: It's okay. Just stick with me.
Once we're through, it will activate and the door will open.
translation: 들어가면 이게 작동해서 문이 열릴 거야

line: We stay close, we stick together...
we get through this. We get out now... or we die trying.
translation: 여기서 못 나가고 죽는다해도 시도해보는 거야

line: There's gotta be a way out! Come on!
The sections of the maze, what's the sequence?
Six! Four! Eight! Three! You got it?
My name is Doctor Ava Paige.
I'm Director of Operations of the World Catastrophe Killzone Department.
If you're watching this, that means you have successfully completed the Maze Trials.
translation: 이걸 보는 여러분은 미로 테스트를 무사히 통과했어요.

line: I wish I could be there in person to congratulate you... but circumstances seem to have prevented it.
translation: 직접 축하해주고 싶지만 상황이 여의치를 않군요

line: I'm sure by now, you must all be very confused...angry...frightened.
translation: 잘 알아요 모두 무척 혼란스럽겠죠. 화나고..무섭다는 거...

line: I can only assure you, that everything that's happened to you... everything we've done to you... it was all done for a reason. You won't remember... but the Sun has scorched our world. Billions of lives lost to fire... famine... The fallout was unimaginable.suffering on a global scale.
translation: 하지만 여러분한테 일어났던 일.. 우리가 여러분한테 한 모든 일에는 그만한 이유가 있었죠. 기억 못하겠지만.. 태양이 우리 세상을 불태웠어요. 수십억 명이 희생됐죠 화재와 굶주림에... 전세계가 상상을 초월하는 끔찍한 고통을 겪었죠..

line: What came after was worse. We called it the Flare.
translation: 하지만 진짜 문제는 그 이후였어요. '플레어'가 퍼졌죠.

line: A deadly virus that attacks the brain. It is violent... unpredictable... incurable. Or so we thought. In time, a new generation emerged that could survive the virus. Suddenly, there was a reason to hope for a cure. But finding it would not be easy.
translation: 뇌를 갉아먹는 치명적인 바이러스로 공격적이고 예측불가이며 치료가 불가능했죠. 그땐 그랬어요. 하지만 세월이 흘러 바이러스에 면역인 세대가 태어났고, 치료가 가능하단 희망이 생겼어요.. 하지만 쉽진 않을 거예요.

line: The young would have to be tested, even sacrificed... inside harsh environments... where their brain activity could be studied. All in an effort to understand... what makes them different... what makes you different.
translation: 젊은이들을 혹독한 환경에 가둬놓고 각종 테스트를 통해 뇌의 활동을 연구해야 하니까.. 이 모든 것의 목적은 단 하나 그들이 왜 다른지, 여러분이 왜 다른지를 알아내는 거죠.

line: You may not realize it... but you're very important.
translation: 잘 모르겠지만 여러분은 우리에게 굉장히 중요한 존재예요.

line: Unfortunately, your trials have only just begun.
As you will no doubt soon discover, not everyone agrees with our methods.
translation: 물론 세상 모두가 우리 방식에 동의하진 않아요

line: Progress is slow, people are scared.
It may be too late for us... for me... but not for you. The outside world awaits.
translation: 우리한텐 너무 늦었을지 몰라요.. 나한테는... 하지만 여러분은 다르죠. 바깥 세상이 여러분을 기다려요.
이걸 알아줘요... 위키드는 좋은 일을 하는 거예요.

line: What are we supposed to do now?
You think we're free out there?
No, there's no escape from this place.
Look at me, look at me!
Chuck, look at me, all right?
I got you, buddy. Just hang on.
No, Chuck. You're gonna give it to them yourself.
translation: 아니, 척 네가 직접 부모님께 드려.

line: You can't just leave him there!
I think it's safe to say the Maze Trials were a complete success.
I wasn't expecting so many survivors, but... the more the merrier.
translation: 그렇게 많이 살아남을 줄 몰랐지만... 많을수록 좋죠

line: Thomas continues to surprise and impress.
translation: 토마스는 역시 계속해서 우릴 놀라게 하네요

line: And for now, they seem to have taken the bait.
translation: 현재로선 모두들 우리 미끼를 문 것 같군요

line: It's too soon to say... but they could be the key to everything.
translation: 아직 단정짓기엔 이르지만 그 아이들이 치료제 개발의 열쇠예요.

line: So let's move forward. It's time now to begin Phase Two.
translation: 그러니 테스트를 계속하죠. 이제 2단계를 시작할 때가 됐어요.
